# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input_string::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_string, " ")
    wrapped_string = ""
    current_line_length = 0

    for word in words
        if current_line_length + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_string *= "\n"
            current_line_length = 0
        end
        wrapped_string *= word * " "
        current_line_length += length(word) + 1
    end

    return trimmed(wrapped_string)
end

# Example usage
println(wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."))
```
